SEARCH

Class LoginControllerTest

java.lang.Object
LoginControllerTest
public class LoginControllerTest extends Object
Comprehensive Unit Test suite for the LoginController class.

This class verifies the authentication logic, file parsing mechanisms, and error handling scenarios. It utilizes Java Reflection to inject JavaFX dependencies and handles JavaFX threading constraints.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Zainab
